Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: redalloverthelandguyhere on June 25, 2013, 02:16 am
I remember Frank Sinatra, now its all noise and drugs!

Which is great!  ;)

Actually Red is excited over our upcoming private festival  ;D

Each year me and the guys (men only shit!) go off to a remote part of the British Isle.

When there, we camp out. We bring the bare essentials, some fresh water, waterproof clothes and boots. Shorts and sunglasses. Musical instruments.

We prety much live off the land. We buy a lamb from the farmer and eat it. We fish and eat the fish. The bread is made by some farmers wife. Even the butter, we get the farmers buter.

We get all the fruit and veg also. Plus some of us know wild mushrooms (no magic, that's October) and why pay for those when you can find them for free?

We banned coke and speed, (no chicks and guys on coke or speed = potenial for trouble) we only allow alcohol, bud, hash, oil, kief and cannabis cakes. Mushrooms, of course. LSD on hand, a few go for that every year but the big night is the communal pot of mushroom tea.

MDMA is acceptable also. People think its for raves only, or D&B events. Actually, its great outdoors around a fire with a few good friends.

A few benzos just in case someone goes el loco a bit  :) Well, we are hardly going to take someone to the hospital just because they cannot handle some hallucinagenics. 2mg of UK pharm Valium by Roche is at hand. 10mg of that, you can rescue someone caught up in a bad trip. Thats all they would do at the hospital, maybe with IV but we are miles from nowhere and when we are tripping we have chased down a few who have ran! We got torches. The nearest pub would be about 30 miles away.

We roam around, explore and check up on a few plants we like  ;D

The other festival we do, cannot say where, but I got a buddy who is into synchronised firework displays. The shit is set to music. Again, out come the mushrooms sometimes  ;D

I tend to find a spot far from the crowd. You cannot smoke a joint in the UK without someone crying about it! But, on a serious note, there are children and Red does not take drugs around children. Its not a drug friendly festival situation. Plus, you really cannot smoke most bud within a quarter mile radius of any cop. Cops see people smoking by them as taking the piss.

So, if your going to a festival, get that canine proof 'new' wrapping for your bud, hash and any other drug which has a distictive odour!

And remember, there are cops at festivals. Most are just there for the odd bit of trouble. Some are there for drugs! Mostly selling but if you are young and prety 'open' about drugs, be more cautious.

And hello to anyone working a night shift right now.

We just watched some nature shows about wolves. Fantastic creatures. But off topic I guess. Plus, nice as they are we'd shoot them with a licensed shotgun if any attacked. No that we got any near us. We're all just talking about it. Basically talking shit after smoking that good old Atlas2012 hash, plus The Scurvy Crew Pakistani hash.

Slow night at work  ;D

Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: slirp on June 28, 2013, 10:17 pm
I'd like a festival but with a private hotel room (with a properly toilet, shower and sink) for my use.  I can't even comprehend how so many of you have no problems rolling/tripping your asses off in congested crowds of people, potentially repetitive music that you can't control, and no facilities to use if the drugs wreck your digestive system.  I envy you.

I would like to trip in nature but there's too many damn mosquitoes in my part of the world.
Title: Re: Festivals!

Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: ytabletrash on July 01, 2013, 01:47 am
you arent supposed to throw out poop because it can give the people who work at the dump/trash disposal diseases. I also think it might be illegal but Im not sure.

Edit: not like anyone really cares about things being illegal here though
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: FollowIcculus on July 01, 2013, 01:59 am

I don't really care if something is illegal or not but I wouldn't wanna contribute to giving somebody some disease or something.  What I can't get my head around is that, while feces is pretty gross, I would think there are even worse things as far as disease carriers that get thrown in the trash all the time.

Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: l33tn355 on July 01, 2013, 08:47 am
Plenty of good DJs at American festivals, you just have to look past the pop bull shit. The Neon Garden at EDC was fucking slamming this year with awesome tunes and proper DJs. I will say UMF is a shit fest though. It's basically a giant frat party.

I'd recommend either heading to Europe and Ibiza or BPM fest in Mexico. If you can't afford that, than DEMF or Wavefront are pretty good. Insomniac is starting to hookup the tech and proper house lineups at their festivals though, so lots of good stuff every few months in CA.
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: enlightener on July 01, 2013, 09:06 am
If you are planning on an euro trip don't forget to stop by at ozora,that is if you are into psychedelic trance/ambient psy/chill out/progressive psy

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m5uCvlEGCDc

love n light to all the tribes heading out for this season,see you on the otherside (:

Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: slirp on July 01, 2013, 10:16 pm
UMF has lots hot college girls doing drugs.  That's good in my book.  I actually like much of the music as well.  Don't hate.  I'd probably enjoy a lot of other festivals as well.

What amazes me is how many college kids are able to afford the event.  They had what, 350,000 attendees this year?

oh and the fact that the police didn't come in and bust people except for a handful of small drug charges is pretty cool.

Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: Festivalia on July 03, 2013, 06:31 am
Quote from: Stonedstupor on July 03, 2013, 03:41 am

EDC vegas was a rolling good time this year, have my presale ultra tic for next year and looking into the wonderland events coming up. Really want to do electric forest, sounds like a blast, perfect place to loose your identity and space travel.
After and long hiatus from the world i have decided to go full out this year and try to hit all the big events. Any recommendations from vets on festivals that might not be so mainstream?
Uhh say fuck all that button-pushing, knob turning bullshit and hit a bunch of Phish shows?

FollowIcculus you should check out Pretty Lights new album A Color Map of the Sun. should change your perspective on electronic music. a year of production went towards recording his own samples with musicians and pushing them to vinyl, then mixing them. check it out

I love PLM. All Good in a couple weeks is going to be insanity; I love seeing Pretty Lights outdoors, and he's playing right after Furthur. His beats are headie, and his samples are rich and oldie; full of soul.

Not much of a Bassnectar fan though. There's only so many songs with that robotic bass noise I can take, before I'm like "This is all the same song, with the same drop." :P

To me, the perfect festival is one with a lot of big name headliners from the scene-past; Furthur(Dead), Cheese, Phish (The Three Kings of Jam, imo), DMB, Neil Young, Bob Dylan, Willie Nelson, Robert Plant, Tom Petty, or whatever other classic rock, or psychedelic rock artist of the past is currently on tour. With some good independent music, and tastefully assorted EDM artists as the day time and late night performers.

I hate being bombarded with house beats and/or heavy dub step in the blazing sun... I'd rather be listening to something chill. Save the bass-drops for after midnight.
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: kssr on July 04, 2013, 08:35 am
Quote from: goodvibez on June 03, 2013, 03:02 am
So I've kinda already asked this before but never really got anywhere with it.... Just would be awesome if anyone could give any advice and good stealth ways to get a good amount of goodies into a festival, thanks for any input!!

If it's a non-camping festival I recommend MBB, dishwasher, another MBB, taped to balls like suggested and hope for best.

If it's a camping festival I recommend MBB, dishwasher, another MBB, stealth it inside a camping chair, electric lantern or any camping item that has free space and is easily accessed with a scewdriver! Put it this way if a dog does pick you up they won't go far as far as dismantling every item you have,etc they normally just do a bag check then frisk. Uhh I smoked a joint earlier officer.. hence why dog maybe picked me up.. as you sneakily walk past with 100g of MDMA.

Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: awesome1126 on July 06, 2013, 09:50 pm
I've "toured" with both PL and nectar. PL scene is a little older and a little less rowdy.

Also PL was incredible at E forest.
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: Festivalia on July 06, 2013, 11:14 pm
Quote from: awesome1126 on July 06, 2013, 09:50 pm
I've "toured" with both PL and nectar. PL scene is a little older and a little less rowdy.

Also PL was incredible at E forest.

"A little older" is an understatement. I've seen Nectar 7 times, and only 1 time was I surrounded by 'peers' ... I'm in my 30s. His crowd seems predominantly 16-20 and over-zealous about throwing glow sticks.   

On the other hand I've had the chance to chill with Derek Smith(Derek Vincent), and have been backstage for a few performances. I've seen him live over 2 dozen times. His crowd is predominantly late 20s - late 30s, and we like to dance... not have glow-stick wars!

That's a generational age gap. :P

Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: FollowIcculus on July 08, 2013, 07:12 pm

debating on snagging k or saving my money and stocking up on LSD at a phish show this summer, whatcha think?
Unfortunately there seems to be more and more RC's sold as L on lot every year.  If you want to buy L at a Phish show I'd bring a black light.  If you can find good stuff though you can be sure its cheaper than on here where everyone seems to think its worth $15-20/hit. :o
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: slirp on July 08, 2013, 09:47 pm
Quote from: FollowIcculus on July 08, 2013, 07:12 pm
Quote from: Mcrad on July 08, 2013, 06:52 am
Quote from: lunarpursuit on July 08, 2013, 06:40 am
@FollowIcculus

Don't listen to the custie EDM noobs.

Techno is where it's at.

If you have iTunes, go find the Resident Advisor Luke Hess podcast from a few weeks ago.

P.S. Phish are going to be firing on ALL cylinders by the end of this fucking tour. Hoping for a big Fall Tour.

debating on snagging k or saving my money and stocking up on LSD at a phish show this summer, whatcha think?
Unfortunately there seems to be more and more RC's sold as L on lot every year.  If you want to buy L at a Phish show I'd bring a black light.  If you can find good stuff though you can be sure its cheaper than on here where everyone seems to think its worth $15-20/hit. :o

$15-$20/hit?

You need to buy more than one hit at a time to get a decent deal but I've definitely seen (and purchased) domestic LSD off SR for far less than $15-$20/hit.  Supply is up and down but $325 for 50 hits from OrderOfThePhoenix.  JackieChan offers 10 strips for less than $100.  There are others as well.

I'm not sure that a blacklight is going to definitely tell you if you have real LSD or something like 25x-NBOMe.  I've never heard of that, anyway.

I'm pretty happy buying off SR, doing a reagent test and being sure I've got legit LSD now that domestic LSD is available.

Regardless, best of luck.
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: ytabletrash on July 09, 2013, 01:33 am
You can get $400 sheets on lot of quality L. Just got to break out the test kits.
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: anom on July 09, 2013, 02:28 am

Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: slirp on July 09, 2013, 02:44 am
The penalty for selling is severe in the US.  Selling at a festival is a risk that I would never take personally.  That's just me though.  I'm certainly appreciative to those people that work hard to get wonderful drugs like MDMA and LSD to the rest of us.
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: ytabletrash on July 09, 2013, 02:56 am
You would be surprised the amount of weight that moves at festivals. Theres people selling that come up with 100k from one festival.
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: lunarpursuit on July 09, 2013, 03:41 am
Quote from: ytabletrash on July 09, 2013, 02:56 am
You would be surprised the amount of weight that moves at festivals. Theres people selling that come up with 100k from one festival.

Me and a couple of buddies cleared 50k at a festival one year.

That said, I literally had a fraction of the fun I would've if I wasn't working so hard.

Nowadays I just take care of my friends for the most part, which is no small job. This weekend there will be 150+ of us.... Down from about 300 the last couple of years.
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: Mr.Charlie on July 09, 2013, 03:04 pm
I sell at events occasionally, but I've been taking it slow since I'm relatively new to it. Most I've brought is an oz, an that was just once, every other time i usually bring like 10g to an a half oz. Enough to get a couple hundo maybe to help me travel back home or wherever.

I don't think I'd really bring more than an oz unless i had a small crew to help me move it, which is a possibility next season.
I also try to take care of it in shifts, or just knock out all the selling in one day. At Waka I tried to sell my shit the first day, and NO ONE was buying, i got there early so i was walking around and everyone was too busy setting their shit up. Sure enough though the next day I sold out within like two hours. It was amazing shit though so i figured it'd go quick. The best was the dude who had a test kit. I saw his neighbors peeking over, and as soon as they saw the color reaction they came over and asked to get as much as they could.

Im thinking about bringing my own test kit next year
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: Festivalia on July 10, 2013, 05:39 am
Quote from: ytabletrash on July 09, 2013, 02:56 am
You would be surprised the amount of weight that moves at festivals. Theres people selling that come up with 100k from one festival.

Most I've made at one was like 35k. :P
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: anom on July 10, 2013, 05:56 am
I guess the better way to pose my question is this - we know there are notoriously lenient festivals (camp bisco this weekend - jealous of you ytabletrash), and there are some that are particularly strict.  One was even mentioned in this thread, but for the life of me i cant find it now

Does anyone know of a list of festivals to all out AVOID selling at.  After all, just about each and every one has the clientele, the question really just comes down to safety, which at most festivals, can be achieved (IMO)
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: Festivalia on July 10, 2013, 06:09 am
Quote from: anom on July 10, 2013, 05:56 am
I guess the better way to pose my question is this - we know there are notoriously lenient festivals (camp bisco this weekend - jealous of you ytabletrash), and there are some that are particularly strict.  One was even mentioned in this thread, but for the life of me i cant find it now

Does anyone know of a list of festivals to all out AVOID selling at.  After all, just about each and every one has the clientele, the question really just comes down to safety, which at most festivals, can be achieved (IMO)

In my honest opinion, it has more to do with 'who is playing', as opposed to which venue it is.  Drugs and lax security tend to be part of the 'vibe' at certain band's shows/festivals, whereas, when it's more of a main-stream crowd, security is almost always way more intense.
Title: Re: Festivals!

Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: slirp on July 10, 2013, 12:10 pm
Go to a state like Florida and just 10g of a phenethylamine such as MDMA or 2C-B is considered trafficking with a minimum mandatory sentence of years in prison.  I didn't hear about any busts at UMF but if you get caught then the penalty is severe.  Maybe there are safe ways to sell but I'm pretty clueless on how that's possible.
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: DivineMomentsofTruth on July 10, 2013, 01:34 pm

If you want to sell, Phish show is the way to go. My one friend told me he has been to over 30 phish shows for that reason.

Go to phish shows to jam out, not to make money.  It's way more phun that way, I wasted too much time getting people spun out and making money on previous tours to enjoy shows like I am this summer.

Camp Bisco was amazing. I would be surprised if more than 5% of the people didnt get fucked up. I found a guy with some AMAZING LSD that made me trip for a solid 12 hours from 1 dose with a nice and slow transition to peak and then back down. Also I got to try Cherry Cola(MDA), Opium and candy flipping for the first times. Managed to ground score a bowl and over $200 worth of ketamine. Also my friend saved some kids life as the staff members were around him watching him die on the ground and doing nothing, not even calling EMTs. Fucking scum.

Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: PlanB on July 31, 2013, 07:31 pm
I'm heading to a festival called Bestival in September in the UK. Got an awesome vibe appaz, as most of my mates have been in previous years so its all good. Now I recently purchased 55 Tabs of decent 110ug Hoffman Print and am looking to sell all of this at Bestival, but as I've never been and my friends are not acid heads I'm wondering if I will end up selling them all.

And if I do sell have any, have any of you got tips to keep my stuff safe, like avoid security, and tips on carrying that much cash on me over the four day festival?!

Thanks Guys
PlanB 8)
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: Festivalia on July 31, 2013, 09:23 pm
To all those who post in this thread... I am noticing a LOT of under cover DEA hitting festivals this summer.  Three for three for me, in fact, all of which were mentioned by others(or myself) here - having made large amounts of money or smuggling large quantities of drugs into last year.

Under Covers happen at festivals, especially those that happen year after year and gain popularity. But not usually DEA... fake hippies w/ long hair... etc. 

We need to be safe, and smart, if we're going to be on the winning side of the war on drugs.  Have had a couple close-calls this summer, but I'm sure not all of you have the cop-mentality and know how to spot an undercover.  This comes from years of dealing drugs in urban environments that are commonly infiltrated by under cover police.

Simplest solution... to stop talking about the good festivals, to keep them good. 


Peace!

Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: psychedelicmind on August 01, 2013, 08:15 am
Quote from: PlanB on July 31, 2013, 07:31 pm
I'm heading to a festival called Bestival in September in the UK. Got an awesome vibe appaz, as most of my mates have been in previous years so its all good. Now I recently purchased 55 Tabs of decent 110ug Hoffman Print and am looking to sell all of this at Bestival, but as I've never been and my friends are not acid heads I'm wondering if I will end up selling them all.

And if I do sell have any, have any of you got tips to keep my stuff safe, like avoid security, and tips on carrying that much cash on me over the four day festival?!

Thanks Guys
PlanB 8)

You will definitely get rid of 55 tabs of acid at Bestival. You'd get rid of 10 times that quantity if you had it ;)

To keep it safe when entering the festival, put the acid in between 2 pages of a book and glue the 3 sides of the pages together. hen put the book in your bag. This will also prevent the acid from degrading. Regarding money - I always wear a pair of shorts/trousers with a few pockets. Like cargo shorts. Keep money in one, drugs in another etc. You'll figure it out!

Hope you enjoy it; it will be a really good festival :)
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: Oneyedwilly on August 01, 2013, 11:23 am
hey PlanB, you should have no problems at Bestival - but for your safety I would just let you know that you should have everything stashed away even before you get to the ferry as there is a lot of hoop jumping to get thru before you even get to the festival.  With blotter you might want to look into splitting it up and stashing it in unusual but tight and hard to get to places such as behind your phones battery or camera battery etc. Security aren't going to be that thorough.  At least with blotter it isn't going to get smelt by the dogs and is very easy to hide! you should have no problems at all...
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: PlanB on August 01, 2013, 03:05 pm

PlanB 8)

You will definitely get rid of 55 tabs of acid at Bestival. You'd get rid of 10 times that quantity if you had it ;)

To keep it safe when entering the festival, put the acid in between 2 pages of a book and glue the 3 sides of the pages together. hen put the book in your bag. This will also prevent the acid from degrading. Regarding money - I always wear a pair of shorts/trousers with a few pockets. Like cargo shorts. Keep money in one, drugs in another etc. You'll figure it out!

Hope you enjoy it; it will be a really good festival :)

Firstly thanks for the reply dude!
Feeling alot happier now that I could easily shift 55 tabs, and yeah I was thinking about putting it in a book I would bring with me. Yeah gunna wear some shorts with zippy pockets as well to avoid and nosey hands going down my pockets. Luckily sniffer dogs should'nt be to much of a worry for me as I only have LSD not MDMA or Weed.
The last thing I'm worried about is undercover security in the festival grounds, but I'm just going to be super vigilant not blatant with my selling. What's the best way to go out and find business guys as I've never sold at a festival?
Is it going round tents saying "Anyone want Lucy/Acid" it ear wigging to see if people mention it.

Regards
PlanB 8)

Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: dngdwn on August 02, 2013, 10:06 am
Quote from: Oneyedwilly on August 01, 2013, 11:23 am
hey PlanB, you should have no problems at Bestival - but for your safety I would just let you know that you should have everything stashed away even before you get to the ferry as there is a lot of hoop jumping to get thru before you even get to the festival.  With blotter you might want to look into splitting it up and stashing it in unusual but tight and hard to get to places such as behind your phones battery or camera battery etc. Security aren't going to be that thorough.  At least with blotter it isn't going to get smelt by the dogs and is very easy to hide! you should have no problems at all...

Beat me to saying this but yeah its important to remember that the isle of wight police force make there whole years worth of drug arrests over two weekends while the isle of wight festival and bestival are on with acid you should be sound but definitely better to be safe than sorry. In terms of selling it around the campsite you should be chilled selling it but I wouldn't run around the main arena trying to sell tabs as theres a lot more chance of security seeing you. Have a great weekend though man I went last year for the second time and it was one of my better UK festival experiences.

Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: skrillyskrill on August 03, 2013, 01:01 am
Quote from: Festivalia on July 31, 2013, 09:23 pm
To all those who post in this thread... I am noticing a LOT of under cover DEA hitting festivals this summer.  Three for three for me, in fact, all of which were mentioned by others(or myself) here - having made large amounts of money or smuggling large quantities of drugs into last year.

Under Covers happen at festivals, especially those that happen year after year and gain popularity. But not usually DEA... fake hippies w/ long hair... etc. 

We need to be safe, and smart, if we're going to be on the winning side of the war on drugs.  Have had a couple close-calls this summer, but I'm sure not all of you have the cop-mentality and know how to spot an undercover.  This comes from years of dealing drugs in urban environments that are commonly infiltrated by under cover police.

Simplest solution... to stop talking about the good festivals, to keep them good. 


Peace!



I saw this happen at HARD SUMMER LA 2012

from 11pm until closing (3am) lots of people(about15-20 spread out), not the raver type of people, walking around talking on their cell phones.(bass was soo loud, no way they could be talking on their cell, possible just using that to hide their earpiece) they were going up to people asking where molly was. when the person said no they would walk away and put their cell right back on their ear (and the screen was black the whole time) and walk about 50 ft and ask someone else..me and my group noticed this and instantly just started watching them do this. id notice 3 or 4 of these people would occasionaly group up for 15-30 seconds then split up again. one even came up to me and my group with a joint, sat down and tried to bullshit with us. my friend asked if that was a joint and he said yes and passed it to him. My friend gave it a pass under his nose and looked at me and shook his head and smiled. that thing didnt smell like weed at all(im a medical patient. i know weed when i smell it......even the shwaggiest of shwag).gave it right back to him and he looked confused. he cut the the shit, asked if we had molly. we said no (we were rollin tits tho) and he said alright thanks and took off....immediately putting his head to a cell phone without even dialing anything or the screen turning on. it was dark and he sat with his right side away from everyone so we couldnt see if he had a earpiece but total sketch.he was around our ages(mid late 20's)maybe a lil older and could tell he wasnt a partier at all.

I sold at ONE event in 2009. brought 80 pills to a rave and sold out within an hour. at 15 a pop i had my pockets stuffed with cash. its an amazing kickass feeling to do that....but unless you have the 3-person system its hard to not look obvious, and selling to random people you have to be able to judge them within 5 seconds to know if you want to let this person know you got some. I didnt sell to anyone who wasnt already rollin or obviously burn out from rollin every weekend lol. or id ask strike up a convo with a gf and bf couple about events theyve been too and if everything seemd cool id  give thenm the head up to find me if they needed anything.

  I like to enjoy my events, and not watching my back constantly, so i just bring personals for the event and deal with the cash within my group after we get back to the mo-mo. If your seen even just handling cash not at a consession you'll get the UC's or even the PD walkin upto ya and hassling ya. and better believe they will have one deputy following you from a distance for an hour to see if you make any transactions.

Be careful out there this weekend at HARD, they were deep last year, im sure they will be bigger and smarter this year!

Title: Re: Festivals!

Under Covers happen at festivals, especially those that happen year after year and gain popularity. But not usually DEA... fake hippies w/ long hair... etc. 

We need to be safe, and smart, if we're going to be on the winning side of the war on drugs.  Have had a couple close-calls this summer, but I'm sure not all of you have the cop-mentality and know how to spot an undercover.  This comes from years of dealing drugs in urban environments that are commonly infiltrated by under cover police.

Simplest solution... to stop talking about the good festivals, to keep them good. 


Peace!

Under Covers happen at festivals, especially those that happen year after year and gain popularity. But not usually DEA... fake hippies w/ long hair... etc. 

We need to be safe, and smart, if we're going to be on the winning side of the war on drugs.  Have had a couple close-calls this summer, but I'm sure not all of you have the cop-mentality and know how to spot an undercover.  This comes from years of dealing drugs in urban environments that are commonly infiltrated by under cover police.

Simplest solution... to stop talking about the good festivals, to keep them good. 


Peace!

 we said no (we were rollin tits tho)


this made my day


Now-a-days they will simply camp right up next to you, and befriend you for 2-3 days, then arrest you when you've dug yourself a nice little hole.  You've likely seen a real-deal DEA undercover at a festival; you just don't know that you did.  Local PD and detectives tend to be very 'standard issue', their UCs stand out like a boner in gym-shorts.

              I think that openly talking about where you're going, or where(which festival) you make the most money selling drugs at, can only bring more heat.
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: Thekla1 on August 07, 2013, 11:32 pm
My friend went to Bestival last year, said the LE activity on the way in was a bit much, but they had their things in a smell-proof bag in girlfriend's crotch and no probs getting through. But not the easiest fest to take dog-sniffable stuff into.

Me, it's GREEN MAN in a week! From folk to psych to techno in the Welsh Mountains, cannot fucking wait. An awesome, beautiful, boutique fest. One of the very best in the UK, and our third consecutive year.

PS like gettin' nekkid in the saunas too  :D

Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: zandermanreturns on August 11, 2013, 05:17 am

To all those who post in this thread... I am noticing a LOT of under cover DEA hitting festivals this summer.  Three for three for me, in fact, all of which were mentioned by others(or myself) here - having made large amounts of money or smuggling large quantities of drugs into last year.

Under Covers happen at festivals, especially those that happen year after year and gain popularity. But not usually DEA... fake hippies w/ long hair... etc. 

We need to be safe, and smart, if we're going to be on the winning side of the war on drugs.  Have had a couple close-calls this summer, but I'm sure not all of you have the cop-mentality and know how to spot an undercover.  This comes from years of dealing drugs in urban environments that are commonly infiltrated by under cover police.

Simplest solution... to stop talking about the good festivals, to keep them good. 


Peace!



I saw this happen at HARD SUMMER LA 2012

from 11pm until closing (3am) lots of people(about15-20 spread out), not the raver type of people, walking around talking on their cell phones.(bass was soo loud, no way they could be talking on their cell, possible just using that to hide their earpiece) they were going up to people asking where molly was. when the person said no they would walk away and put their cell right back on their ear (and the screen was black the whole time) and walk about 50 ft and ask someone else..me and my group noticed this and instantly just started watching them do this. id notice 3 or 4 of these people would occasionaly group up for 15-30 seconds then split up again. one even came up to me and my group with a joint, sat down and tried to bullshit with us. my friend asked if that was a joint and he said yes and passed it to him. My friend gave it a pass under his nose and looked at me and shook his head and smiled. that thing didnt smell like weed at all(im a medical patient. i know weed when i smell it......even the shwaggiest of shwag).gave it right back to him and he looked confused. he cut the the shit, asked if we had molly. we said no (we were rollin tits tho) and he said alright thanks and took off....immediately putting his head to a cell phone without even dialing anything or the screen turning on. it was dark and he sat with his right side away from everyone so we couldnt see if he had a earpiece but total sketch.he was around our ages(mid late 20's)maybe a lil older and could tell he wasnt a partier at all.

I sold at ONE event in 2009. brought 80 pills to a rave and sold out within an hour. at 15 a pop i had my pockets stuffed with cash. its an amazing kickass feeling to do that....but unless you have the 3-person system its hard to not look obvious, and selling to random people you have to be able to judge them within 5 seconds to know if you want to let this person know you got some. I didnt sell to anyone who wasnt already rollin or obviously burn out from rollin every weekend lol. or id ask strike up a convo with a gf and bf couple about events theyve been too and if everything seemd cool id  give thenm the head up to find me if they needed anything.

  I like to enjoy my events, and not watching my back constantly, so i just bring personals for the event and deal with the cash within my group after we get back to the mo-mo. If your seen even just handling cash not at a consession you'll get the UC's or even the PD walkin upto ya and hassling ya. and better believe they will have one deputy following you from a distance for an hour to see if you make any transactions.

Be careful out there this weekend at HARD, they were deep last year, im sure they will be bigger and smarter this year!



cops city this year, very uncomfortable and shitty venue. Not ever going to that again.

I have to stay away from addy. had HORRIBLE withdrawals from it. and you dont even know, I have these tinted sunglasses and every light viewed through them is x10000 and rainbows everywhere. i cannont WAIT for bassnectar with these babies ;] .. if i took mdma two days in a row, would the second day have any effect?
Title: Re: Festivals!

Yes.  It wouldn't be as strong as night 1, obviously.  I usually have to take 150 mils to feel what i got off 100 the night before.

believe it or not, to get me a good roll I need at least 200mg. im 253 lbs.

It's likely the quality of MDMA.  Try Old Amsterdam's stuff.  There's a lot of crystal on SR, but only a few true PMK White vendors.  Brown Sand and the Merck style moonrock I usually start with 180mg.

75-90 mg of PMK White and I'm rolling dick, cleaner and harder than the other stuff.

I forgot who told me to get some of clearance's MDMA, but i just did a couple days ago. I will be bringing it with me to ezoo :]

Ahh, yes. 
                 One of clearance's pals bought a bit of my PMK White that I was re-selling on my vendor account from Old A.  He said they tested mine and clearances, and they looked identical, and both reacted to black with bubbling almost to a boil instantly with Marquis reagent. They're lightly-tan, almost white crystals with no yellow, brown, pink, purple, grey, or any other coloration.  Just white, consistent. 

                 I suppose you will have a very very good time then.  If this is your first time ingesting Clearance's stuff, try a lower dose.  I am almost as heavy as you, but I am tall as fuck and have low body fat %.  I would take 125 if you think 200 is what you'd need with run-of-the-mill MDMA you've come across in the past.

I have to stay away from addy. had HORRIBLE withdrawals from it. and you dont even know, I have these tinted sunglasses and every light viewed through them is x10000 and rainbows everywhere. i cannont WAIT for bassnectar with these babies ;] .. if i took mdma two days in a row, would the second day have any effect?

Yes.  It wouldn't be as strong as night 1, obviously.  I usually have to take 150 mils to feel what i got off 100 the night before.


believe it or not, to get me a good roll I need at least 200mg. im 253 lbs.

It's likely the quality of MDMA.  Try Old Amsterdam's stuff.  There's a lot of crystal on SR, but only a few true PMK White vendors.  Brown Sand and the Merck style moonrock I usually start with 180mg.

75-90 mg of PMK White and I'm rolling dick, cleaner and harder than the other stuff.


I forgot who told me to get some of clearance's MDMA, but i just did a couple days ago. I will be bringing it with me to ezoo :]

Ahh, yes. 
                 One of clearance's pals bought a bit of my PMK White that I was re-selling on my vendor account from Old A.  He said they tested mine and clearances, and they looked identical, and both reacted to black with bubbling almost to a boil instantly with Marquis reagent. They're lightly-tan, almost white crystals with no yellow, brown, pink, purple, grey, or any other coloration.  Just white, consistent. 

                 I suppose you will have a very very good time then.  If this is your first time ingesting Clearance's stuff, try a lower dose.  I am almost as heavy as you, but I am tall as fuck and have low body fat %.  I would take 125 if you think 200 is what you'd need with run-of-the-mill MDMA you've come across in the past.


DAMN. really? im 6' 3'' and 253lbs.. im fat LOL but what you just said surprised me. you think it would be possible for me to roll 2 days in a row with this stuff? and the last mdma i bought was from Jimmy Neurchon and 250mg of that got me so fucking good hahahaha

Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: Praetorian on August 18, 2013, 08:44 am
Quote from: ScoobyDoo on August 18, 2013, 08:33 am
Quote from: Praetorian on August 18, 2013, 08:17 am
Also, if its not mentioned there it should be -many studies show that THC reduces some of the damage done by MDMA. It's good to smoke while you roll.

Hmm. Did not know that.

I rolled two nights in row once.
Never again will I do that.

90 Mg of PMK White MDMA, you can roll 2-3 nights in a row, as long as you're eating well, and supplementing.  After the 3rd night you're still going to be pretty cooked, but it's not going to cause serotonin disease.  Not unless you're bombing, and re-upping each night.  But, I've gone 4-5 days, and by day 5 I was being ridiculous and eating like .400 to get off.  I was depressed for like a week. lol

2 nights isn't too bad if you pace yourself.
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: Praetorian on August 18, 2013, 08:45 am
A good deal of it has to do with age too... if you're 18-22, you're going to bounce back a lot faster(I believe) than someone who is 25-35.  So on and so on. 
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: ScoobyDoo on August 18, 2013, 09:05 am
Quote from: Praetorian on August 18, 2013, 08:44 am

Quote from: Praetorian on August 18, 2013, 08:17 am
Also, if its not mentioned there it should be -many studies show that THC reduces some of the damage done by MDMA. It's good to smoke while you roll.

Hmm. Did not know that.

I rolled two nights in row once.
Never again will I do that.

90 Mg of PMK White MDMA, you can roll 2-3 nights in a row, as long as you're eating well, and supplementing.  After the 3rd night you're still going to be pretty cooked, but it's not going to cause serotonin disease.  Not unless you're bombing, and re-upping each night.  But, I've gone 4-5 days, and by day 5 I was being ridiculous and eating like .400 to get off.  I was depressed for like a week. lol

2 nights isn't too bad if you pace yourself.

I think a lot of it had to do with setting.
The second night I went to a buddys house to get rid of some MDMA.

They all told me they had rolled the day before and I eventually convinced myself that since they were doing it, it was okay.
I was wrong.

I ended up spending the night watching 3 other dudes play need4speed.
I don't think MDMA is something that should be taken impulsively just cause you feel like rollin' and don't have shit else to do.
Use it as a treat. Keep it special to keep from losing the magic.

Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: dngdwn on August 26, 2013, 05:22 am
Quote from: Praetorian on August 18, 2013, 08:45 am
A good deal of it has to do with age too... if you're 18-22, you're going to bounce back a lot faster(I believe) than someone who is 25-35.  So on and so on.

Definitely true I'm 22 and I went to Beacons festival and took reasonable amounts of MDMA two nights in a row and some 2C-E the next day and my comedown on the Monday and Tuesday was far more unbearable than I remember anything from my teenage years. Going to try and avoid taking MDMA on consecutive days from now on or if I do I will prepare more adequately and probably give 5-HTP a go. I'm sure the 2C-E did me no favors in the serotonin department either and should probably reconsider combing these drugs if I want to avoid feeling like a puppy that had its face stomped on for a few days.
Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: Mr.Charlie on August 26, 2013, 03:03 pm
If I'm at a multiple day event and going to be eating multiple drugs, I usually take a few supplements in the morning, ( multi-vitamin and 5-htp)

When it comes to MDMA an MDA, I usually roll one days, take a day off and eat lots of food an chill and then eat more MDMA after the day of rest. I find its better to do that than just straight up eat it two days in a row.

Plus I only do that once every two months tops. I don't eat drugs nearly as much as I used to. In 2010 I ate LSD at least once a week, sometimes eating mushrooms/MDMA and/or LSD also in the same week.

Kinda lost the "magic" in MDMA, and LSD was making me one helluva goofy motherfucker, all the time. Physiologically I was totally fine, and I never hit depression or anything, in fact, I was quite a consistently happy guy who traveled quite alot and met a lot of great people.

But enough is enough.

I'm actually taking a break from festivals for awhile, i'm bummed, but I got a lot of responsibilities I have to take care of. I'm sure I'll hop on one or two here n there
Title: Re: Festivals!

Post by: slirp on September 02, 2013, 01:12 am
I'm a bit pissed that are already blaming "molly" for these two deaths.  Even if they both had genuine MDMA in their systems which hasn't been shown yet it still doesn't prove causation.

One of the two, a guy, arrives at the hospital around midnight but didn't go into cardiac arrest until after 3am.  So guessing either other toxic drugs where involved or the hospital fucked up.

damn shame.

also there were 31 arrests, and a 16 year old girl raped and left under a van. 
here is a article about it :
*CLEARNET* http://gothamist.com/2013/09/02/woman_who_died_at_electric_zoo_repo.php

"On Friday and Saturday, two people died and four were hospitalized due to Ecstasy-related illnesses at the Electric Zoo electronic music festival on Randall's Island. The deaths of Olivia Rotondo, 20, a University of New Hampshire junior from North Providence, RI, and Jeffery Russ, 23, a Syracuse University graduate from Rochester, ultimately prompting officials to cancel the third day of the event. Both died of an overdose from MDMA, more specifically molly, a more concentrated form of the drug. The Post reports that on Saturday Rotondo told an EMS worker, I just took six hits of Molly, before collapsing in a seizure and dying.
Hours before her death, Rotondo tweeted her excitement about attending the fifth annual Electric Zoo: The amount of traveling Ive done today is unreal. Just get me to the damn zoo." She was the nicest girl Ive ever had the pleasure of knowing, Noah Burkholz, a friend who had traveled to the festival with her, told the Times. Her grandfather Henry Rotondo, 73, told the Post, She was a great kid thats all I can tell you.
Police do not believe that Rotondo and Russ knew each other. Russ, who died early Saturday morning, graduated from Syracuse University last year with a degree in information technology. Now there will be no grandchildren, no nieces, no nephews, no wedding, Russ father, John Russ, told the Daily News. Everything you look forward to in life is gone because of one pill.
Police say that the four concertgoers who also became critically ill due to drug use are expected to recover. In addition to all that, a 16-year-old girl was sexually assaulted and 31 people were arrested for offenses including drug sales, disorderly conduct, resisting arrest and possession of controlled substances. Many criticized the lax security and the lack of medical staff; one concertgoer told us that it took several hours to get Russ from the festival to the hospital. You saw a lot of people puking and collapsing down and laying on the ground, 19-year-old Christopher Stuebbe told the Times.
While some lashed out at Bloomberg and organizers for canceling events on Sunday, others defended the culture of the event. "I don't think EDM culture promotes drug use at all. Young people are experimental by nature because they have no sense of their own mortality," Leslie Doyle, who has attended Electric Zoo festivals over the years and planned to go on Sunday, wrote us. "Acts of violence would be a good reason to shut down a music festival, there was none of that! This administration reacted to 6 people who made unfortunate personal choices. Their decision to shut down EZoo has tarnished the experience for the collective group of tens of thousands."
"EZoo officials go to great lengths to make this an Eco friendly event, and the DJs make announcements advising people to take care of themselves," she added. "There will always be a few people that lose control. Shutting down Zoo is one more example of the Bloomberg Administration's nannyism. When people die of alcohol poisoning, are they going to shut down the restaurants and bars who serve them?" "

first of all, molly isnt in hits. either pressed pills, crystals/power, or capsule..
2nd of all aparantly the guy has crystal meth in his pocket. 
about 90% of people there were FUCKED up. i did meet alot of sober people.
i also saw 2 people get randomly searched and 2 people tweakin the fuck out.
someone had came up to me and say "yo you want some molly? 40, 60, 80?"
who in the RIGHT mind would buy a GRAM of molly and CONSUME it all??????
-_- shit really angers me, and im so fucking glad the silk road exists, to make sure im getting the real product. test kits are a helper too:]

no sluts like edm sluts !

Wow... yeah cause every woman who goes to EDM fests is a "slut," right? I've been going to fests since I was 18 (I'm 24 now) and I have never gone to a fest thinking, "You know, I'd really like to get fucked while I'm here." I go to have fun and to dance and meet cool people. I think I speak for the majority of WOMEN (that's the more respectful thing to call us, in case you were unaware) when I say this.

This is one of those times when I really wish there was a word to call men that was as disrespectful and vile as words like "slut" and "whore" are to women. If a girl likes to fuck, she likes to fuck. We all like to fuck. That doesn't mean we should be devalued or demeaned by words. Those kind of hateful words have no place at EDM fests.
*end rant*
Title: Re: Festivals!

I'm done with festivals till next Summer, got a few shows lined up but that's it. Might take a really cool Winter vacation if all works out, I love traveling! (Who doesn't?)

Can't wait till next Summer though, allready making a few plans!

no sluts like edm sluts !

Wow... yeah cause every woman who goes to EDM fests is a "slut," right? I've been going to fests since I was 18 (I'm 24 now) and I have never gone to a fest thinking, "You know, I'd really like to get fucked while I'm here." I go to have fun and to dance and meet cool people. I think I speak for the majority of WOMEN (that's the more respectful thing to call us, in case you were unaware) when I say this.

This is one of those times when I really wish there was a word to call men that was as disrespectful and vile as words like "slut" and "whore" are to women. If a girl likes to fuck, she likes to fuck. We all like to fuck. That doesn't mean we should be devalued or demeaned by words. Those kind of hateful words have no place at EDM fests.
*end rant*

who said anything about every woman? i can accept that 'sluts' is an extremely derogatory term for women, and i actually thought twice after i posted it if i should go ahead. and i still did. but now i realize that taken literally, it wasnt the word to use.
i love every woman out there. each woman, girl, lady is magic and beautiful in some way. i open doors for any and all girls so they can go through first. i offer my seat in the metro/bus even when im not even close to my stop. i truly do love all of you. and mean no disrespect to any.
when i talk about 'edm sluts', im not referring to ANY 18-20 year old girl who goes to edm festivals. and i definitely don't mean it in a way that girls who like to have a lot of sex is considered a slut. i was merely referring to these 'barely legal' girls who show up covered in neon colors from nails to eyelashes, get extremely wasted, and basically show up to take pictures so they can post them on instagram.
i guess i misused the term 'sluts', as its meaning implies sleeping around. if these girls were guys, i would call them 'douches'. douche is the term i was aiming for.
your beautiful and unique gn0ssos, sorry if my comment bothered you. im your age, and i know if we had a drink youd enjoy my company :).
LL

Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: GregoryIssacs on September 26, 2013, 06:50 pm
That's why SR rocks, never again do you have to bring cash or deal w/ kids claiming their family or they have the best doses at the festy.   Pre-order everything you know you can smuggle in (minus ganja, let someone else smuggle that in) and enjoy the festy.  It's actually great time management.  Instead of spending time running around lot or shakedown, you can spend time groovin'.  No need to buy test kits from those "bunk police" kids, no need to run around w/ another "rabble-rabble" or "star" or whatever anon* name some road kid that prob. sell you some NBOMe saying it's some fire family L or some shit.  No way for some kid to tell you "i don't have any change, i'll just hook you up w/ an extra hit",


Lovin' what SR has done for my family's budget and lifestyle. 

Making money has become easy for kids working though too, these days you don't have to get on the bus in order to find that dank L or MDMA connect.  You just have to get on the road .   

Times are a changing,

Title: Re: Festivals!
Post by: k4rts on September 30, 2013, 03:35 am
Back from TomorrowWorld! Left Sunday morning. I was having difficulty walking plus I had a lot of lower back pain. I had seen who I wanted to see. I arrived in Dreamville around 7:30pm Thursday. Holy FUCK what a long walk that was. Fucking bullshit really. They made us walk what..1-2 miles one way? How exhausting that is when you are partying solo and having to carry everything by yourself.

Got my tent and everything set up by like 10:30ish. Headed to the gathering and stayed until the last song. Was pretty dope. Chilled by the tent Friday until the sun started to go down. I went to the Dim Mak stage about an hour or so before Steve Aoki was playing. Walked in and was damn near center stage front row on the rail.  I was on some of CC's speed. Fuck yeah. Went to the main stage after he was done playing and got to see porter robinson, sebastion ingrosso, tiesto, and later benny benassi.

Saturday same deal. Hung out by the tent until the sun got lower. Took my chair to the main stage(back problems), sat my ass down in the back and watched the party ensue in front of me. Was able to see calvin harris, axwell, afrojack, and afroki. Axwell's set was incredible.

Not sure if I'd do the 5 day dreamville 3 day ticket thing again unless I went with someone else/a group. Still had a great time.
